name: Get the old DeviantArt logo back
description: Replaces the ZeviantArt logo in DA's upper left corner with the old deviantART logo. Choice of 2011 or 2014 logostyles. Also optionally replaces the logo and text above More Like This. Does not work with the Christmas logo; does work with deviantNAV v7.
additional_info:
1.0.3 11-12-16
1.0.2 6-6-16
1.0.1 5-11-16
1.0 3-14-16

Release notes:

1.0: choice of 2011/2014 logo, choice of fixing More Like This text and icon

1.0.1: reuploaded deleted picture

1.0.2: rehosted pictures in a more stable location

1.0.3: added version number to code for debugging purposes, changed DA link to fav.me for OCD purposes

Written and tested in Firefox 35; cannot guarantee compatibility with other browsers or versions.

On DA: http://fav.me/d9v9vcx

style_setting_options.label: Yes, change it back
